description: Command-line shell and scripting language designed especially for system administration. This command refers to PowerShell version 6 and above (also known as PowerShell Core and cross-platform PowerShell). To use the original Windows version (5.1 and below, also known as the legacy Windows PowerShell), use powershell instead of pwsh. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.core/about/about_pwsh.
